pages.text: $(li)The Taiga is a cold biome composed mostly of grass.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Red and Brown Mushrooms, Dandelions, Violets and Taiga trees.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/raccoon)Raccoons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bears$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/fox)Foxes$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
